greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n contains n terms and each column lists the prime numbers A000040.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: A138139 := proc(n,k) return ithprime(min(k,n-k+1)): end: seq(seq(A138139(n,k), k=1..n), n=1..13); # _Nathaniel Johnston_, Apr 30 2011
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Mar 09 2008, Mar 25 2008
